overview:
Ken has led teams from start-up through public company success. His experience spans market entry, establishing leadership and scaling businesses through profitability.

His roles include Marketing Executive and General Management. At Financial Engines, he led the effort to successfully reinvent the company, resulting in a successful IPO in 2010.

His marketing experience spans B2B and B2C customer acquisition as well as online customer experience design.

Ken is also actively involved in Angel investing and entrepreneurial coaching with focus on Mobile, Social, SaaS and Cloud Computing businesses.
